led_strip_permissions.title: LED strip control requires additional permissions
led_strip_permissions.description:
Your Home Assistant app needs additional permissions to control the LED strip on your Freebox Ultra (MAC: {mac}). To fix this:

1. Open your web browser and go to your Freebox settings at http://mafreebox.freebox.fr or https://mafreebox.freebox.fr
2. Navigate to **Paramètres de la Freebox** → **Gestion des accès** → **Applications**
3. Find the **Home Assistant** application in the list
4. Click on **Home Assistant** to open its permissions
5. In the permissions list, find **Modification des réglages de la Freebox** and check the box to enable it
6. Click **Sauvegarder** to save the changes
7. Restart Home Assistant or reload the Freebox integration

After granting this permission, you will be able to control the LED strip brightness and effects through Home Assistant.
